files.patch:
@@ -215,1 +215,2 @@
-          sudo xcode-select --switch /Applications/Xcode_14.3.1.app/Contents/Developer
+          # We want to use Xcode 15.4, but 15.2 is the highest that the GHA macOS 13 runner supports
+          sudo xcode-select --switch /Applications/Xcode_15.2.app/Contents/Developer
@@ -301,2 +302,1 @@
-          # We want to use Xcode 14, but GHA removed it from the macOS 14 runners
-          # sudo xcode-select --switch /Applications/Xcode_14.3.1.app/Contents/Developer
+          sudo xcode-select --switch /Applications/Xcode_15.4.app/Contents/Developer

@@ -133,3 +133,3 @@
-      <component group="javafx" name="devkit-macosx" version="Xcode14.3.1+1.0.tar">
-         <artifact name="devkit-macosx-Xcode14.3.1+1.0.tar.gz">
-            <sha256 value="6b8ac317a9c2f255060067cfa596d94f6635d51f2eb5c08fe05110cf99e1ac14" origin="Generated by Gradle"/>
+      <component group="javafx" name="devkit-macosx" version="Xcode15.4+1.0.tar">
+         <artifact name="devkit-macosx-Xcode15.4+1.0.tar.gz">
+            <sha256 value="cd1132fbcdf520714cacc0b3c1b300e1b08f5b0949c54dba7a817f7910f9da2e" origin="Generated by Gradle"/>
